content.detailedDescription:
I was about 11 or 12 years old and it was late afternoon in the summer.  nava and i had been playing hide and seek in her parents��� home when her mother told us we were making to much noise and that we had to go outside to play.  so we ran out the front door, to the drive way where we had been drawing with chalk.  we must have sat there at least an hour because about now the drive was full of pictures we had made, and we were nearly sitting on the street drawing.  

a shadow came over us and the drive way, so we looked at each other and then looked up. what we saw was; a large nearly car sized, teardrop, metallic, reflective, solid/but fluid like object hovering on feet above our head.  it wasn���t scary just confusing, curiosity was high, and i actually felt comforted.  like it wanted us to touch it, the bottom seemed to pulse like when you shake a glass of water and it gets ripples.  we both stood up, and i am sure my mouth was wide open, i had chalk in my hand that i dropped.  as i dropped the chalk the object went straight up in the air now it was just above the trees and it was no longer pulsing. 

nava and i looked at each other and the object turned with the smaller side of the tear drop pointing like se, then we looked back up at it.  and it took off moving faster, with the blue sky wrapping around it and the white clouds in the sky the reflection made it nearly invisible.  we could just make out the metallic outline as it flew behind a cloud.  and nava said ���where���d it go?��� and then it reappeared only for a moment above the cloud like it was looking back at us. then it did a turn to the south and was off again. 

we then began screaming, me at the top of my lungs and nava for her mom.  her parents, her mom and dad came out and asked ���what���s wrong what���s wrong.���  which i could barely hear over my own screaming, nava was crying and pointing to the sky.  and finally it was like i just stopped and said it flew over there and we tried desperately to explain what we had just saw.  

her mother said ���i think you all have played enough today��� and her dad told me to go right home.  and i took off running home i didn���t even wipe the chalk from my hands and i ran in the door and was telling my mom in a panic what had happened and what we had saw.  she had me go was my hands and sit in the living room.  i could hear her calling nava���s parents.  mom came back in the room and said that nava���s dad said they might be testing weather balloons or something at the university and that we shouldn���t worry about it.   

nava and i played together after that but things were different it���s like we wanted to talk about it and what had happened but couldn���t.  things just felt weird between us and we both became or like loners, studying more, practicing instruments, and more serious children.   
 
----
 
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? 
	playing with sidewalk chalk at a friend���s home.
 
2. what made you first notice the object?
	a shadow was casted across us on a pretty clear day.
 
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
        i didn���t really think about the object other then i wanted to touch it and was curious.  it wasn���t threatening or scary.  i actually felt confused, comforted, and curious.
 
4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
        teardrop, metallic, reflective, smooth, (solid yet fluid like), no visible lights or hard body shape. just a smooth tear form.  it seemed like the point of the tear was the front and it got thicker and rounder in the back.  it seems like they could see us but we couldn���t really see them through the pulsing bottom.  also the front of the tear drop seemed to be more liquid and clear like.  
 
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after  sighting the object.
	while it was there: we had no fear, calm, curious, shocked, and confused.
        when it left: really confused, shocked, and scared just because we couldn���t explain it and make anyone understand.
 
6. how did you lose sight of the object?
        first lost sight because it seemed to fly under a cloud and then up through it.  it then peeked out above the cloud.
        second time we lost sight because of the trees and houses across the street.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Fluid/teardrop like object, hovered over mine and a friends heads.

content.detailedDescription:
I always said ������ i wish i can see at least one -ufo- before i dye ������, and the funny thing, even that a few days after the event i actually told some one about what i saw, it took a while for me to actually accept that i did see a ufo..
i guess it was so natural that it did not register as a sighting, and only tonight, several months after the occurrence that i came up with the idea to report it.
i���m french canadian from qu���bec so my wording might lead to questioning..Or laughing.. ;)

so��� first i must say that i have been a remote model airplane pilot for about 23 years, i recently move back from ontario to quebec. as you might guess the sighting occurred at my flying field, the club name is amidair.. as my type of flying ������������ a mix of 3d and precision������������ require steady concentration i prefer to fly alone, so i usually get to the field very��� early 05:45 get set up and usually do several flight in a row before the crowd gets there.  

that morning the sky had several patches of gray clouds and i was doing my usual bag of tricks with my plane, and after i did a rolling circle i notice that some thing was occupying a previous empty spot in the shy at around 2 o���clock, honestly, i must admit that i had the feeling of being watch.. i also had the feeling that it was closer to me then the other clouds, we all know that doing a distance evaluation of object in the sky is very difficult since there is no point of reference, as a remote rc pilot like me, it���s some thing you learn the hard way as you think that your plane is in front of the three just to see it disappear in the back of it.. 

so, i���m flying my plane and with time my brain send me a few red flag so i get really interested and i want to take a good look at it so i go in an easy flying mode, doing some long and slow climbing that give me a few good five second to stare at it. the more i look at it the greater my interest grew and the harder it was to fly my plane..

the shape was very surreal, basically it had a center point with 3 long point sticking out, if i remember well one was at 12 o���clock one at 4 oc and one at 8 oc. the surreal part was that it was camouflage like the other cloud with a wad of cloud around the spike and center mass so i never saw any metal or hard surfaces just a 3 spoke cloud��� now i remember thinking ������ that���s the proof.. 3 point clouds don���t exist.. so i kept flying in a survival mode so i could keep my eyes on it up to the time that it did start ������ i guess������ to move away from me, i say i guess��� because with the same outside look, it just shrink smaller and smaller. so if it was going away from me it must have done it in a very.. straight line with me, if it did, that denote some intelligence that it knew that i was looking at it and try to confuse me by not having a lateral movement, i looked at it until it totally disappear then i scan the sky for a moving object, i do think that i saw some thing reflecting the sun doing a small curve but i���m not sure.. 

after that, while i was still flying my remote plane, 2 big 747 did a very��� low fly by right over my head, it seam that they where coming from a take off from the mirabel airport that is fairly close to my flying field..  they both appear in front of me at a good distance going left to right did a long u turn, came over my head, they where so low that i got uncomfortable flying my plane.. the first pass was right over my flying field the second was a bit wider to my back.. i���ve been a member of this club for a few years now, we see our fare share of plane passing over our field on approach to mirabel airport, we have what i call the fedex express that come in like a clock in the morning, we also see a special 4 engine plane with a turbine engine, strap to the right or the cockpit , for engine testing purposes i guess, but never i saw a 747 or two for the matter at such a low altitude.. what crossed my mind for the 747 is that the government is doing some monitoring on ufo, that seems to have.. from what i can read, a weakness for airport traffic..

so there you go.. i now can dye happy because i finally saw one���too bad it took me so long to realize it..
content.summary: Being observed by a 3 points star under a camouflage or mist/cloud.

content.detailedDescription: This accurred around 1967 or 1968 in pico rivera, ca. in the early evening in summer. as i walked out the door i observed the neighbors across the street looking up. as i also looked up i saw a pulsating red light directly above the street. eventually it faded out and disappeared. then i continued up the street to a party 5 houses down. there were approximately 15-16 people in the backyard of the party all were friends of mine from high school. after approx. 20 mnutes something caught my attention in the corner of my eye, as i looked to see what it was i saw 5 points of lights that looked like stars traveling in formation low in the northern horizon traveling slowly from east to west. the lights were observed by my friends also. suddenly the 'stars' stopped in mid flight, zig-zagged, then abruptly changed direction and flew upward and disappeared in an instant. we all fell silent and not sure what to say for a few minutes. we all asked one another if everyone saw the same thing. the rest of the night as we tried to joke about it everyone was quieter than usual and kept shaking our heads in disbelief. occasionally when we get together even now the subject of what we saw will come up and still wonder what the hell it was.
content.summary: 5 bright star-like points of light low on horizon

content.detailedDescription: A sudden appearance of a glowing object apppeared amidst the clouds as if tyring to say hello what was a spinning small silvery blue sphere became a huge silver disc--i could make out square like windows and just really became aware of a galactic connection of divinity-i had a funny feeling in my stomach like someone was tickling me for bout a month or two aftewards i still feel it every now and then--i tried to c if anyone else had seen it on the road but no-one seemed to notice i asked it to come back and not to leave and that i welcomed them--they transmitted to me love i felt it--i felt a sudden awareness of a connection--i do believe i was dematerialized because the week after this happened i went back to that same area and i remember losing time i didnt know where i was or who i was i was a complete zombie--i litterally felt as if i was unfolding-you know like when a piece of aluminum foil unfolds when you crush it---i ran to the shoe store and i was goin to ask them to call the police becuz i didnt know who i was--so yes i just felt a light come through me as i stepped on a blue square on the pavement this light came thru and i went to the stores did what i had to do but i was not on earth--i came from somewhere else--i was teleported--although i didnt like the feeling if it leads me to divine conssciousness so be it! in conclusion they have contacted me and i have accepted them now i see them all the time and i love them and the love me-and i am ready to become and enter into the divine galactic community--pure and simple with love!!
content.summary: Driving home from austin tx to san antonio tx-listening to music all of a sudden i c this huge silvery shiny spinning cloud then a huge disc appeared--i was amazed not scared happy felt like they were tryin to communicate was so divine -i felt like family

content.detailedDescription: Brother in law was outside on my carport smoking approx 19:00 on 2/24, called me outside to see something. due east, above treeline, there was a group of 7 orange lights moving through the sky.  there was no obvious formation, some formed a triangle, some a line, their relative position was constant. there was no sound, no emission and the lights were steady (not twinkling). they moved to the west in a straight line at about airplane speed, and when they passed directly overhead, they would disappear. looking back to their origin, i noticed more lights coming into view, again with no obvious formation and  no sound, just moving steadily to the west and disappearing overhead. i called for my husband, and i tried to move closer to origin to take a picture or video, but a streetlight and tree made viewing worse.  the lights continued across the sky, sporadically for approx 10 minutes.  we are near an air force base and national guard base, but there were no planes in the sky at this time.  my other brother in law is load master at the afb, and was working, but denies any knowledge of exercises that night.
content.summary: 15-20 orange lights moving through sky

content.detailedDescription:
My spouse was returning to work after 11:10 am on the 10th of sept. 2012. she contacted me on the phone after returning to work stating that she had taken pictures (via cell) of something rather strange she spotted while driving on state road 59 by forest park. at first, she though it might be a blimp that sometimes passes over brazil, but this did not look like the normal blimp that travels through the area. i looked at the photos and it did not look like the blimp either, but tha is not to say it is not. she observed the craft hovering and then moving north of the town of brazil, indiana. she took photos on both 59 and by the hardees (north)of the object.

we have  looked at the photos, but no one is sure what the object might be.

you will notice the object below the traffic light and near the power lines in photo 2-3 and in the v of two trees in the first photo. the object appears like a small white object with a dark bottom.
content.summary: Uknown vehicle spotted in the sky during daylight hours.

content.detailedDescription: Feb 14th thursday around 7:00pm 2013, neighbor calls to report a odd light moving over house now hovering above, i ran out with camera in hand to look and see a disc about 21 feet long less then 20 feet above my house, the disc  blew apart befor my eyes into four smaller orbs of light about 1 to 3 feet, two moved toward south first street, other two moved less than a second passed a neighbors house then was gone. a bigger dark triangle was seen above my house neighbors said i called them to look with me.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Feb 14th thursday around 7:00pm 2013, neighbor calls to report  a odd light  moving  over  and  now  hovering above my house.

content.summary: Feb 14th thursday around 7:00pm 2013, neighbor calls to report  a odd light  moving  over  and  now  hovering above my house.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to smoke my morning cigarette, just after i woke my youngest daughter for school.  it was around 6:20 or so.  i was sitting on the porch facing an exterior wall of my bedroom.  i turned to my right to look up in the sky, as i often do when having a smoke, and saw the craft hovering in the sky to the northeast.  my first thought was that i was hallucinating, or possibly my eyes just hadn't adjusted to being awake yet.  (i'm not a morning person) i've tried finding a picture similar to what i saw, but haven't been able to find one.  on first glance, it looked like a small fire in the sky, below the thin, low, partial cloud cover.  when i really looked at it, it appeared to be three (possibly 4-5) orangeish lights stacked on top of each other that were pulsating.  they were way too large to be stars or commercial aircraft.  it looked as though they shone through a haze.  i ran inside and grabbed my cell phone to take a video, but it's not great.  the object was far enough away that you can't really see the detail or shape that i saw with my naked eye.  i took a few clips, sorry for the crappy footage, i didn't have time to run in and grab my tripod.  since this thing seemed to be hanging around, i dashed back inside to get my daughter to come look.  as soon as we made it back outside, it was gone.  simply vanished into thin air.  needless to say, she thinks i'm nuts now (she's 11).  the thing never moved while i was observing it, it just sat there pulsating light.  this isn't the first one i've seen.  the first was on a road trip from midland to lake lbj in high school, a large orange orb that followed my car and then zig-zagged off into the sky.  

then, i saw another last week  on february 21st, during the day on my drive to work.  i turned on to the street heading towards my office building, and saw a small silver disk glinting in the sunlight.  my guess is it was a couple thousand feet up.  it was moving very slowly to the northwest, then poof!  it vanished into thin air.  no video on this one, it happened too fast.
content.summary: Flaming, hovering ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Lisbon, february, 2013; 19:40

i was walking towards north direction talking on the phone with a friend from faro (algarve), when i saw a bright white light moving in the sky (the same intensity of brightness as venus). orion was on the sky zenit and the object pass south of the constelation in a straight line 285��� direction. i told my friend and he came out and saw it too. i live very close to the place where the airplanes make the turn to land therefore i know very well  identify the pattern of a plane flight and its brightness.During the sighting 3 planes were seen contemporaneously. we were talking about the (r)evolution ongoing on the planet with the disclosure of some bad actions regarding religion, politics and banking... when he asked, if i do believe on it... they arrived...  me and my friend talked about it while they passed...
content.summary: Orion was on the sky zenit and the object pass south of the constelation in a straight line 285º direction.

content.detailedDescription: We were having a gathering that night and we were all outside relaxing by a fire when i seen this object with 3 lights shaped like a triangle move through a cloud. i quickly had my friends look up and 3 other people seen the object move in the sky so i know i wasn't crazy. ,the lights were i say to be 10 times bigger then the airplane lights that were up in the sky that night. this also only moved 1 way really fast and then dissapeared over wilmington ca after going through a cloud almost invisible looking.  it could of been 1 object with 3 lights or 3 objects moving together in a traingle form. we kept looking up all night to see if maybe it was a big party light they use sometimes but this was over a area that would never have a light in the sky. we only seen it one time so im sure it wasn't party light. also it went through the only cloud that was at the time above us. maybe to hide itself.
content.summary: Seen 3 lights in a triangle form move through a cloud and dissapear

content.detailedDescription: About 530 pm i was driving east on ave g near 50th west and fox airfield in lancaster ca. i was taking pictures of a weird cloud formation to the east and upon review of the picture i saw a black anomaly located in the upper right hand corner. the picture was captured while driving on a iphone 5. the picture was taken through the windshield going about 70mph. i did not see the object. i really do not believe its a true ufo, and i think it's a possible camera anomaly and i am trying to debunk it first.
content.summary: Found in picture that i took

content.detailedDescription: Scared the heck out of both myself and my wife.  at approx 7 pm christmas eve, observed two orange lights slowly hovering overhead.  apparant path was southeast to northeast.  witnessed for about 5 minutes before disappearing abruptly.  either the lights dimmed out or the object disappeared.  definately was intelligent, both lights flew in a formation and appeared to hover for a few moments.
content.summary: Observed two orange ufos christmas eve, slowly moving overhead for 5 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my back door, let the dogs out. i looked up and seen 1 object that looked like a shinny ball. i told was about to tell my kids to look up at what i though might be a satellite. just as i was about to say that i noticed 2 more just behind it and then i noticed the sun reflecting off of crescent shaped wings on them. i told the kids to look at them. then one of the 2 trailing objects made a sharp left and went around the other trailing object to its right rear area. they continued south then accelerated at different speeds and faded behind some clouds to the south.
content.summary: 3 objects moving north to south

content.detailedDescription:
On the weekend of february 17th 2013, i was working in ballarat, victoria. at 2:30 am on sunday morning, walking back to my motel room from armstrong street towards doveton street, i entered the wigton place laneway. 
i noticed a formation of 12 lights in a clear night sky above and just in front me. the formation took up the small section of sky that was visible to me between the buildings either side of the lane.                  
i estimated that the lights were at cloud height. 
the lights were slightly larger than stars and at first that���s what i took them to be, it was only when i stopped walking to observe them that i realized they were moving in a westerly direction. i watched the lights move forward at a slow pace for 10 seconds. then they suddenly accelerated forwards at an incredible speed and disappeared into the horizon.
i ran after the lights to see if i could catch a glimpse of them but they were gone. i was alone at the time of the incident. there were no people walking by and no traffic noise, the lights were silent and no noise was audible when they accelerated.
the next day at mid morning, i went back to wigton place to photograph the area and sky where i had seen the formation. at 2am, 18th february 2013, i returned to the lane to see if i had confused what i had saw with the constellations visible between the buildings.
i could see orion���s belt and other constellations but none that were similar to the formation of the night before. i remembered that i had not seen any stars when the lights were above me which leads me to believe that the lights may have represented the underside of a large craft that was obscuring the sky.
content.summary: Cluster of 12 lights slowly flying above and just in front of me. after 20 seconds, lights accelerated to incredible speed and disappeared into horizon

content.detailedDescription:
Urubici, santa catarina, brazil - local: morro da igreja, radar da aeronautica, cindacta.

i dont speak ingles!!!
content.summary: Discoide

content.detailedDescription: I saw a sunlight glint of something in the sky like an rc plane flying. i thought it was awful high for an rc so i kept watching. then there was another. i wondered if there was an rc club flying but they were really high off the ground like half a mile. i stepped out from around a tree that was partially blocking my view. then i saw 5. they weren't there the whole time but were appearing. they were little orbs with a a light coming from inside. every once in a while one of them would reflect sunlight like it was metallic then the light from inside was less prominent. i counted six. i decided then they were ufo's so i called my friend and asked her to come over right away. while i had her on the phone more appeared to the se of the original group. they were in circular, random flight but were relative to each other. they were like gnats but not as quick. more graceful. hard to count the new group but i would say a dozen. all together i think i was looking at 18 when they joined. by the time my friend got there, there were only 2 or 3 left. she saw them. they kind of just disappeared to the north. when i say disappeared i don't mean distance in horizontal miles but more like above the cloud cover. i asked my friend "did you see them?" she said "i saw something". good enough for me. she described them just like i did so i feel confident they were ufo's. i took pictures with my camera phone but all i got was blue sky. the resolution is just too poor to show anything.
content.summary: Orbs flying like gnats

content.detailedDescription: It was late on my way home when i saw a red light zoom over head then a blue lightmabe 60 ft above so i ran up to a neibors house and nocked on the door .The lady awnserd and thought i was nuts so her husband came out with his boys and a video camera an more red and blue lights vipping down the mountain from the south heading north verylow  and over the hills to the north twenty total ...But in the middle was like to squers hooked together tumbling slowly .They were translucent with a oil in water sheen .The man was trying to film it but nothing he kept saying this is weird i just charved this an when it was all over video camera started working and jet s from all directions came swarming in atlest 10 or so
content.summary: Small fleet of ufos and mother ship

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It was about 5:00 a.M. and once again i stepped outside for a smoke. i noticed an object flying through the sky which i assumed was a plane, due to the aviation lights i saw on it. but after a few minutes i noticed it was moving too slow to be a plane, that and the aviation lights (there were three, two blue ones on either end and a red one in the middle of the object) were blinking randomly, not in any order at all.

i watched it as it flew over me and that was when i noticed that it didn't have any wings, it was completely disc like. i was in shock because i have never seen a ufo in such detail.

here's the weird part though. i was completely transfixed by this object, forgot i was even smoking a cigarette and watched it as it flew over the tree line and out of view completely. i hate that i didn't have my phone with me so i could take a picture, but i even wonder if i would have being so transfixed on this object. i didn't even think about taking a picture of it until i had come back inside. from now on my phone stays with me and one way or another i am going to take a picture of the objects i have been seeing lately.
content.summary: Strange object traveling slowly through morning sky

content.detailedDescription:
I have no idea as to what possesed me to take a picture of the sky like i did but i discovered this (and other) photos while downloading them from our cameraphone. i can't think of why i would have stopped, pointed the camera up to the sky like i apparently did.

this was around my house (highland, ca) just before noon i believe and from what it appears i must have thought i saw something and took the pic then forgot about it or something i don't know. i discovered more photos as well showing the same object in multiple frames. 

again i don't recall the incident at all. but these are my photos from a cameraphone i own and from my neighborhood.
content.summary: Caught on film (unknown reason why i took photo of sky)

content.detailedDescription: Feb 14th thursday around 7:00pm 2013, neighbor calls to report a odd light moving over our house now hovering above, i ran out with camera in hand to look and see a disc about 21 feet long less than 20 feet above my house, the disc blew apart before my eyes into four smaller orbs of light about 1 to 3 feet, two moved toward south first street, other two moved less than a second passed a neighors house then was gone. a bigger dark triangle was seen above my house neighbors said. i called them to look with me.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Feb 14th thursday around 7:00pm  2013,  neighbor  reports  a  odd  light  moving over our house.

content.detailedDescription: I did not notice the object until i had downloaded my pictuers on to my pc then realised that there was this object farther off then the wood pile in front of me the sky was burn orange and the object is bell shaped on top with a rim and then a lower section that tapered .Looks like some photos i have seen before on ufo programs not a bug as it is beyon the closet objects in my shot.
content.summary: The object showed up in my phot taking sunset pictuers out of my back yard

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving the house at 12:55am feb 24 2013 to go to the store when i stepped out my front door and noticed the whole sky was lit up with 50+ orange orbs!!( i've seen the orange orbs before but only 1-3 at a time) my first thought was that they were embers from a fire, but quickly realized they were all rising up from one spot northwest of the house a couple miles away, out over the ocean, and they all were traveling south with different flight paths and at different altitudes~ some were stopping and hovering then speeding up to catch others and maneuvering around each other, while others kept steady straight paths. also some would get real bright then dim out then would light up again. i quickly took out my cell phone and tried to record what i was seeing and filmed for about 47 seconds but didn't think i was picking up anything, so i raced to the bedroom and woke up my wife( she believes, but has never seen )and excitingly told her "come quick~ you gotta see this!! she was startled by my emergency, and asked me whats going on? i told her everything's ok~ but you gotta see this!! i coaxed her out of bed and to the front door and pointed to the sky and said "look at that~ what the hell are those?!!" at this point there were about 20 or so still coming towards us and as they got directly to the west of our position, the closest to us, they would fade out and disappear from sight. not one could be seen once it was past the west parallel or southwest of us. she just stood there not really saying anything while i pointed out where they were coming from and some of the crazy maneuvers they were doing. we watched as one by one they would cross the west parallel and fade out until the last one was gone... the only way i can really compare what i saw is to the video of the clusters taken in daytime in south america and mexico...
content.summary: Observed 50+ orange orbs asend from ocean fly over house in a north to south flight path at different altitudes

content.detailedDescription: Feb 14th thursday around 7:00pm 2013, neighbor calls to report a odd light moving over our house now hovering above, i ran out with camera in hand to look and see a disc about 21 feet long less than 20 feet above my house, the disc blew apart before my eyes into four smaller orbs of light about 1 to 3 feet, two moved toward south first street, other two moved less than a second passed a neighors house then was gone. a bigger dark triangle was seen above my house neighbors said. i called them to look with me.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Feb 14th thursday around 7:00pm  2013,  neighbor  reports  a  odd  light  moving over our house.

content.detailedDescription: I have been observing these objects since over the summer and video taped a lot of them. they are a normal thing at later times of the night and i know they aren't aircraft due to my experience in the aviation field. i was outside smoking a cig and saw a bright light chaging different colors hovering for about 15 minutes in the same spot. i know it wasn't an airplane as it was with out a doubt hovering and the lights were in no way regulation for civilian or military. towards the end of the event i heard some rustling in the leaves in the school yard that is directly behind my house and a man stepped out dressing in all black. i couldn't see his face due to lack of light but he was just staring at me not moving. i went inside and locked the doors as this was very disturbing. as i went to close the blinds i looked out again and he was not longer there as i had my cell phone in my hand to call the cops. i don't know if this was coincidence or connected but it was pretty unnerving and sent a crazy chill down my spine.
content.summary: Saw object hovering and then man in black appeared in school yard

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on dvp lights moved fast and odd thought it might be a toy or a kite but to big. for a toy and lights are to heavy for a kite plus,  it headed upwards and completed a circle without turning upsidedown.
content.summary: Looked similar to youtube sighting posted february 17.   3 lights one red two blue.  never seen anything fly like that.

content.detailedDescription: Was walking in a very small, rural town with 3 other people and we saw red lights rising and descending in the trees near an abandoned coal-mine.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw red lights hovering, ascending and descending

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend went outside for a smoke and to the north he saw a grouping of red lights about 30 degrees off the horizon. at first he thought they were flares. but, they did not descend and they had no trails of smoke. instead, they ascended in different directions. he came and got me to witness this and i saw what looked like a flock of red lights, at least 20, like a firework but they were ascending and traveled south, pretty much over our house. they made no sound, and had pulsating red lights and eventually as they got more overhead the lights twinkled out. they were moving fairly fast, not just floating. once the red light went out on one of them, i saw a silhouette in the moonlight of a sphere shape, kinda brown in color.  the two of us stood there in disbelief because we could not think of one logical explanation for what we were seeing. we were stunned enough that neither one of us wanted to miss anything so neither one of us grabbed the camera!! we feel pretty stupid about that now. finally, they all just faded away into the south sky.
content.summary: We saw some redlights in the sky that we can not explain.

content.detailedDescription: When i was 15 i was visiting cousins in ashtabula, ohio in the summer of 1967. on my first night there, i was sleeping alone in a separate room on the second floor.  i had gone to sleep about 10pm.  in the dead of night, appx 2am i was awoken by a bright light shining on me from the sky through the window.  i found that i couldn't move.  i was confused, but did not feel threatened.  i didn't react at all, but went straight back to sleep.It felt as if i was being observed or examined, but also being communicated with.  i remembered the event the next morning but for some reason did not say anything to anybody, until right now.
content.summary: While i was sleeping a bright light shone through the window and paralyzed me
